title: Rounded stems
content:
Anyone know of a way to automatically produce rounded stems without the "bone effect", illustrated to the left in the picture? Preferably in Illustrator, since I work with strokes. Perhaps a plugin which lets you control the calligraphy brush tool to a greater extent..

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819091148im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bild_3570.gif)
author: Toby
